text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Horatio Chriesman, June 7, 1825. Twenty men to be on guard during investigation of Buckner.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*The Public peace being endangered by the refractory and seditious practices of *person_mentioned*Aylett C Buckner*/person_mentioned* and others Connected with him and it being necessary for the Common tranquility of the *location_mentioned*Settlement */location_mentioned*that an investigation of such disorderly Conduct should be had. Therefore In order to protect the *person_mentioned*Authorities of the Government*/person_mentioned* and preserve good order, you are hereby Commanded to raise a body of *person_mentioned*Twenty Men*/person_mentioned* from your *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*and hold them Subject to my orders at this place on *date_mentioned n="06-11-1825">Saturday next the Eleventh day of this Month*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-07-1825">June 7 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Lt. Col, of Militia*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Capn Horace Chrisman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
